title: How to find free original music - Quora

response.answer_text: Soundation is a great place to find music (basically all instrumentals) that are user-made. It’s actually a music making studio in itself, so you can make your own as well, if you so choose. It’s a great site, I use it all the time. You can find me there by searching for “Fever Dream Studios” in the “Tracks” section. I have one track that says “Test,” on my channel that just means it’s a different version of a song I’ve already published. It’s better than the old one though. :)
